sentences.sCn: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.sContent: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.sCn: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.sContent: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.sCn: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

sentences.sContent: ...But perhaps they don’t have to turn themselves into private investigators or Congressional subcommittees...
...Some simplistically attribute the decline in our public education system to the drain of skilled students by private schools...
...public schools provided far better education than private ones...
...It was the underperforming students who were thrown out of public schools and went to private ones...
...Didn't you see the private sign over there...
...But their beds were provided by private individuals...
...That was the great thing about Facebook you could create own little private network...
...I would still prefer a career in the private sector...
...we must add approximately 6 billion private languages since each one of us necessarily has one...

exam.question: Mr. Morgan can be very sad ______, though in public he is extremely cheerful.

answer.explain: in private：  单独， 私下。句意：  摩根先生私下里可能会很悲伤， 尽管在公众面前他显得非常愉快。by himself：  独自； in person：  亲自， 本人； as individual：  作为个人。

phrases.pCn: 私人公司；股份不公开公司
n. 私立学校；私立中小学
自有品牌；私有品牌；商店自用品牌
私人密钥，个人密钥（用于把即将发送的消息进行加密的密钥）
私人银行；私人银行业务

remMethod.val: priv(私有的) ＋ ate(具有…的) → 私人的； 秘密的

words.tran: 私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员

trans.tranOther: for use by one person or group, not for everyone
